assignment1

Interface Agent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PredatorRandom, PreySimple

    public interface Agent
    This interface contains the basic methods all agents (both predators and preys) must implement.
    Author:
    josago

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACTION_EAST 
      static int ACTION_NORTH 
      static int ACTION_SOUTH 
      static int ACTION_STAY 
      static int ACTION_WEST 
      static int TYPE_PREDATOR 
      static int TYPE_PREY 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getSymbol()
      Returns the UTF-8 symbol used to represent this agent on the board.
      int getType()
      Returns either TYPE_PREY or TYPE_PREDATOR.
      float pi(State env, int action)
      Given a state and an action (from ACTION_*), this method returns the probability of taking it.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        int getType()
        Returns either TYPE_PREY or TYPE_PREDATOR.
        Returns:
        Either TYPE_PREY or TYPE_PREDATOR.

      • getSymbol

        java.lang.String getSymbol()
        Returns the UTF-8 symbol used to represent this agent on the board.
        Returns:

      • pi

        float pi(State env,
       int action)
        Given a state and an action (from ACTION_*), this method returns the probability of taking it.
        Parameters:
        env - A state.
        action - An action.
        Returns:
        The probability (from 0 to 1, both inclusive) of taking the given action in the given state.
